Description: Bone or limestone amulet in the form of a head, loop for suspension above.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.58. J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 110.
Exhibition history: 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
